title: Bug 18163: Add Import should ignore leading/trailing whitespace
description: The current behavior of the 'Add Import' feature is not handling leading/trailing whitespace correctly. When selecting a node using 'Shift + Ctrl + Right' combination, the resulting inserted code includes an extra space after 'Node', resulting in incorrect code. This bug report aims to address this issue and fix the behavior of the 'Add Import' feature to ignore leading/trailing whitespace correctly.
OB: When selecting a node using 'Shift + Ctrl + Right' combination, the 'Add Import' feature does not ignore leading/trailing whitespace and inserts an extra space after 'Node '
EB: When selecting a node using 'Shift + Ctrl + Right' combination, the 'Add Import' feature ignores leading/trailing whitespace and correctly inserts 'Node' without any extra spaces.
SR: The 'Add Import' feature needs to be modified to handle leading/trailing whitespace correctly when selecting a node using 'Shift + Ctrl + Right' combination. The feature should ignore any leading/trailing whitespace and insert the selected code without any extra spaces.
